```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(rg2)
library(dplyr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

## Parameters

There are 3 types of parameters for rg2:

1. aesthetic mapping
1. plot style
1. cfg

`cfg` parameter in rg2 is a object of list, a full supported options document: [G2Plot API](https://antv-g2plot.gitee.io/en/docs/api/plot-api)

## Example

a basic example

```{r}
ggplot2::economics_long %>% 
  filter(variable %in% c('psavert', 'uempmed')) %>% 
  g2Line(date, value, seriesField = variable)
```
